name: LD46 - Medic!
description:
You are a medic! Keep your simple-minded solider alive as long as you can by removing bullets from his body and providing him with heals or combat drugs.
Use A/D or numbers 1-5 to select your command and SPACE to use it.
Move your character with the ARROW KEYS.

Didn't quite have the usual Halflemon studios team onboard because it's peak dissertation season but here's the game anyway.
